feed.title: Get Rusty While Building a Database

entry.title: Words That Need To Be Said
entry.summary: I have a motto. If you want to learn something very well, teach it - Some wise person Well, not exactly mine. But it is something I heard long time ago and it has proven to be true time and time again. So, as much…
entry.content:
I have a motto.

If you want to learn something very well, teach it - Some wise person

Well, not exactly mine. But it is something I heard long time ago and it has proven to be true time and time again.

So, as much as I am making this as a contribution to Rust and Rust learners, it is also a selfish endeavour to learn more myself.
